article.headline: Houston Baptist 73, Utah Valley St. 63
article.story: HOUSTON -- Caleb Crayton scored 23 points and Rob Lewis added 12 as Houston Baptist defeated Utah Valley 73-63 on Saturday night. Dauson Womack and Art Bernardi added 10 points each for the Huskies (11-14, 3-3 Great West), who took control with an 18-6 run in the second half en route to a seventh straight victory. Holton Hunsaker scored 26 points and Ben Aird 19 for the Wolverines (13-15, 2-5). After a basket by Hunsaker tied the score at 46-all, Lewis scored back-to-back baskets to spark the decisive run. Crayton added six points during the surge, which made the score 64-52 with 5:26 remaining.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
